Question: This person's embrace of born-again Christianity was unpopular with some of his fans and fellow musicians.
Hints: Much of Guthrie's repertoire was actually channeled through Elliott, and this person paid tribute to Elliott in Chronicles (2004).
After his European tour, this person returned to New York, but the pressures on him increased.
As of 2009, this person lives in Malibu, California, when not on the road.
